example[0]: A range of official Disney merchandise was on sale.
definition[1]: to try to sell goods or services using methods such as advertising
example[2]: If the product is properly merchandised, it should sell very well.
definition[2]: goods that are produced in order to be sold, especially goods that are sold in a store
example[3]: Even though retailers ordered merchandise carefully this year, they are getting ready for huge after-Christmas sales.
definition[3]: to try to sell goods or services using advertising, PROMOTIONs etc
example[4]: Retail stores try to merchandise products in a way that will attract customers.
